scripts.build: astro build && npm run export:markdown && npm run generate:llms
scripts.perf:audit: npm run build && npx serve dist -l 3000 & sleep 3 && npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --budget-path=performance-budget.json --view && pkill -f 'serve dist'
scripts.perf:check: npm run build && npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --budget-path=performance-budget.json --output=json --output-path=lighthouse-report.json
